tg.t: Starblanket; literally: One who has Stars as a Blanket; name of Cree chief, signatory to Treaty 4
s/he is verbally abused, s/he is wronged verbally, s/he is slandered, s/he is badmouthed
Edmonton, AB; Fort Edmonton; literally: Beaver Hills House
He is on the look-out for him.
s/he looks out for s.o., s/he waits and watches for s.o., s/he lies in watch for s.o.
s/he crawls back, s/he crawls backwards
He shook hands with him or them.
s/he greets s.o., s/he sends greetings to s.o.; s/he says hello to s.o.; s/he shakes hands with s.o.; s/he hugs s.o. in greeting, s/he kisses s.o. in greeting; s/he bids s.o. farewell
begin to, beginning; progressively, proceed to, going on, progressing; on the way
s/he has s.t., s/he owns s.t.
He is here/there. (Animate) E.g. 'êkota kî-ayâw.' He was there.
s/he is, s/he is there; s/he lives there, s/he stays there
He has or owns something animate (like a dog).
s/he has s.o., s/he owns s.o.
place of residence; state of being
clothes; clothing, apparel; [singular:] article of clothing
He is telling a story about him.
s/he tells about s.o., s/he talks about s.o.; s/he narrates about s.o.
s/he tells, s/he tells a story; s/he tells news, s/he gives an account, s/he narrates; s/he tells his/her own story
story, true story, account, report; news; what is being told
s/he moves his/her own abode, s/he moves from one place to another
at noon, when it's noon (12:00 p.m.)
s/he eats at noon; s/he has lunch
it is Wednesday; literally: (it is) middle day
s/he recovers from illness, s/he is gradually restored
it is a bright day, it is good weather
s/he is thus, s/he is thus in health, s/he is in such shape; s/he is unwell, s/he is in poor health
s/he crawls off to one side
He is praying to the Creator.
s/he prays, s/he pleads, s/he chants
An important day (as Christmas or Easter).
it is an important day (e.g. Christmas, New Year)
He is being taught. He's learning. He is going to school.
s/he learns; s/he is a student, s/he attends school; s/he is taught
it is day, it is daylight
s/he tries s.o. on (e.g. article of clothing); s/he tries going with s.o.
s/he changes his/her own shape or form
s/he tells bad things of s.o., s/he tells hurtful gossip of s.o.
it is bad weather, it is a bad day
s/he snores; s/he is heard from a distance while sleeping
It is a bad day. There is a bad weather. There is a storm.
it is a bad day; it is nasty, it is bad weather; it is a storm, it is storming
while it is dark, night time
Saskatoon, SK; literally: at the Saskatoon berry
it is a nice day, it is a fine day; it is good weather
it is a fine night, it is a good night
s/he eats, s/he has a meal
s/he looks for s.t., s/he search for s.t.; s/he looks out for s.t.
s/he looks around for s.o., s/he searches for s.o.; s/he looks out for s.o.
s/he looks around for s.o., s/he searches for s.o.
s/he goes to see s.t., s/he fetches s.t.
s/he goes to see s.o., s/he fetches s.o.
s/he learns Cree, Cree ways; s/he attends Cree school
s/he has a good appetite; s/he is a habitual eater
s/he goes to see s.t., s/he tries to see s.t.
s/he goes and sees s.o., s/he tries to see s.o., s/he goes to visit s.o.
s/he looks, s/he takes a look
go and, go to; engaged in
for the future, in the future
go ahead, go on, be off!
it is a point of land
it is a dance, a time of dancing
next summer; in the (coming) summer, when it's summer
it is Tuesday; literally: (it is) the second day
it is Tuesday night; literally: (it is) the second night
my grandmother; [reference extended to all related females of grandmother's generation]; my respected female elder
my uncle, my parallel uncle; my father's brother, my mother's sister's husband
s/he is hungry; s/he wants to eat, s/he would like to eat
He ran short of it. He is short of it.
s/he lacks (s.t.); s/he falls short, s/he runs short (of s.t.); s/he is in want
He ran short of it. He is short of it.
it is insufficient, it falls short
He has a brother who is a cousin.
he has a brother, he has a male parallel cousin
from there, thence, out of; with, by means of; because of; for; from then; about
s/he sheds tears; s/he has tears dropping
s/he is from there, s/he comes from there; s/he exists thence, therefore
s/he has (s.o. as) an older sister
young one, young person, young creature; the young
Regina, SK; Pile-o'-Bones; literally: where the bones are piled
Calgary, AB; literally: at the elbow; at his/her elbow in reference to the Bow River
These animate items her. E.g. These cars here. 'minôsak ôki'.
He goes around telling news of him.
s/he goes around telling news of s.o.
s/he stays here and there; s/he bums around; s/he is unstable
He flees about while getting chased.
s/he paddles about, s/he canoes about; it swims around (e.g. an animal)
s/he misses s.o. (when trying to bite him)
come and; towards, approaching; hither; thence, from there on down; [towards focus]
one; alone, single; the only one
it is Monday; literally: (it is) the first day
s/he crawls about, s/he crawls around, s/he creeps
next winter; when it's winter, if it's winter
it is winter; is one year
in the afternoon, when it's afternoon
it is after midnight, it is very early morning
it is Monday; literally: (it is) the day after prayer day
s/he stops eating, s/he is finished eating
at night, tonight, when it's night; when it gets dark
Night time. V - It is night.
it is night, it is night time; it is dark
s/he says the wrong thing; s/he loses his/her own train of thought while speaking
It is a very dark night.
it is a dark night, it is very dark
s/he sees s.t., s/he witnesses s.t.
s/he sees s.o., s/he witnesses s.o.
[generally in negative phrases:] s/he is blind
s/he lives with s.o., s/he dwells with s.o.
s/he has someone as a dinner companion; s/he eats with s.o.
s/he originates (temporally) together with s.o.; s/he is born together with s.o.
He increases his family. He increases his weight.
s/he grows; s/he has progeny; [plural:] they increase as a family
increase of family, increase of population
s/he crawls off to one side
it is that; the fact that
it is getting dark, night is approaching
s/he makes false accusations against people
it is well into the night, it is late in the evening
it is thus, it is in such a state
s/he has s.o. so, s/he has s.o. in such a position
character; being is such a state; being in such health
it is such weather, the weather is thus
s/he sees s.t. thus, s/he witnesses s.t. thus, s/he has such a vision
s/he is foolish, s/he is a fool; s/he is crazy
s/he praises people, s/he speaks approvingly of people, s/he brags about people
s/he speaks meanly to people, s/he nags people; s/he speaks poorly of people
s/he speaks meanly of him/herself, s/he speaks poorly of him/herself; s/he tells a hard luck story about him/herself
s/he consoles people verbally, s/he speaks to console people
prayer, chant; praying, praying in a traditional manner, chanting prayers, supplication of the spirits
s/he stops people verbally, s/he convinces people to stop, s/he coaxes people to stop
s/he is there permanently, s/he stays there forever
it is there permanently, it is permanent
s/he thinks of people in a kindly way
it is the end of the day
s/he belittles people, s/he slanders people
secret, in secret, stealthy, by stealth; private, in private
s/he is finished, s/he is through
s/he feels sorry for people, s/he finds people to be abandoned
s/he races, s/he is in a race; it gallops
s/he speaks forthrightly to people, s/he correctly informs people
s/he gets carried away in talking
s/he turns around to the opposite side, s/he is turned around (e.g. a pivot)
being depraved, being of evil character
she becomes pregnant with s.o., she conceives s.o.
they are all together; they gather together
s/he is not well, s/he is in distress
while s/he eats, s/he is eating currently
s/he eats a lot of s.t., s/he eats much of s.t.
s/he is well, s/he is in good health; s/he has his/her health restored; s/he has a good life
go ahead, go on, be off!
my home, my dwelling, my house
s/he scolds over something; s/he prevents improper action
it is this; the fact that; then; when; as it is, actually [focus marker]
s/he comes to live, s/he comes to stay
s/he wears s.o. crooked; s/he wears s.o. wrong
s/he is tired of looking at s.t.
s/he is tired of looking at s.o.
every second week, every fortnight, fortnightly
every second day, every other day
s/he tells a beautiful story about s.o.
crying easily, being prone to crying
